languages.english-overview:
ChurchCRM is a free church management platform. Manage your congregation's information, online and in person giving, groups, church, sunday school attendance and much more.
ChurchCRM is released under the The MIT License (MIT).

ul.li: Dashboards : Dashboards gives you quick view about your members
Data Import : You can import data from a comma-separated value (.csv) file
Sunday School class reports with child and parent contact information
Email Sunday School class, teachers, and parents with the click of a button
Maps : Visualize members' home addresses with Google Maps integration
Email all families at once requesting info verification
Finances : ChurchCRM has a finance function for tracking tithes, pledges and gifts.
Fundraiser : Fundraiser automation is used for events where members are buying and selling items and/or services to benefit the church
Volunteers : This feature is used to keep track of talent and the willingness of volunteers for specific tasks
Calendar : Keep track of events and member birthdays
Canvass Support : ChurchCRM includes comprehensive support to facilitate an every-member canvass effort.
